}}'''''Minecraft'': Beginner's Guide''' is a ''Minecraft'' book authored by [[Mojang AB]] and [[Mojang|The Official Minecraft Team]], introducing new players to the mechanics of the game.

== Synopsis ==
{{Quote|'''Dive into Minecraft headfirst with this all-new beginnerâ€™s guide that will teach you everything you need to know for starting your Minecraft journey, whether that be in Survival mode or Creative.'''

Are you new to Minecraft or still not quite getting the hang of it? Then this book is for you! Join characters such as Miss Hap, Sir Vival and Bill Ding on an adventure through the Overworld, to discover how you can ace your early game.

Learn everything from what happens when you die and how to avoid it to how to feed yourself and where to find the cutest mobs. So what are you waiting for? Pick up the book and start your epic adventure!

Full of fun and humor, this guide is perfect for kids of all ages.}}
